info.title: Artifacts API
info.description:
Artifacts is an API-based MMO game where you can manage 5 characters to explore, fight, gather resources, craft items and much more.

Website: https://artifactsmmo.com/

Documentation: https://docs.artifactsmmo.com/

OpenAPI Spec: https://api.artifactsmmo.com/openapi.json

get.description: Return the status of the game server.
Fetch bank details.
Fetch all items in your bank.

parameters.name: item_code

schema.title: Item code
schema.description: Item to search in your bank.

parameters.description: Item to search in your bank.

parameters.name: code

schema.title: Item code

get.description: Fetch active characters details.
Retrieve the details of a character.
List of all effects. Effects are used by equipment, tools, runes, consumables and monsters. An effect is an action that produces an effect on the game.
Retrieve the details of an effect.
Fetch active events details.
Fetch events details.

post.description:
Spawn a specific event by code consuming 1 event token.

Rules:
  - Maximum active events defined by utils.config.max_active_events().
  - Event must not already be active.
  - Member or founder account required.

563.description: Insufficient event tokens. You need at least 1 event token to spawn an event.

error.message: Insufficient event tokens. You need at least 1 event token to spawn an event.

564.description: Event not found or already active.

error.message: Event not found or already active.

critical_strike.title: Critical Strike
critical_strike.description: % Critical strike. Critical strikes adds 50% extra damage to an attack (1.5x).

wisdom.title: Wisdom
wisdom.description: Wisdom increases the amount of XP gained from fights and skills (1% extra per 10 wisdom).

prospecting.title: Prospecting
prospecting.description: Prospecting increases the chances of getting drops from fights and skills (1% extra per 10 PP).

initiative.title: Initiative
initiative.description: Initiative determines turn order in combat. Higher initiative goes first.

threat.title: Threat
threat.description: Threat level affects monster targeting in multi-character combat.

dmg.title: Dmg
dmg.description: % Damage. Damage increases your attack in all elements.

dmg_fire.title: Dmg Fire
dmg_fire.description: % Fire damage. Damage increases your fire attack.

dmg_earth.title: Dmg Earth
dmg_earth.description: % Earth damage. Damage increases your earth attack.

dmg_water.title: Dmg Water
dmg_water.description: % Water damage. Damage increases your water attack.

dmg_air.title: Dmg Air
dmg_air.description: % Air damage. Damage increases your air attack.

effects.title: Effects
effects.description: List of active effects on the character.

turns.title: Turns
turns.description: Number of turns the combat lasted.

iterations.title: Iterations
iterations.description: Number of combat iterations to simulate.

total_seconds.title: Total Seconds
total_seconds.description: The total seconds of the cooldown.

remaining_seconds.title: Remaining Seconds
remaining_seconds.description: The remaining seconds of the cooldown.

skill.title: Skill code
skill.description: Skill required to craft the item.

level.title: Level
level.description: The skill level required to craft the item.

items.title: Items
items.description: List of items required to craft the item.

x.title: X
x.description: The x coordinate of the destination.

y.title: Y
y.description: The y coordinate of the destination.

map_id.title: Map Id
map_id.description: The map ID of the destination.

code.title: Code
code.description: The code of the effect. This is the effect's unique identifier (ID).

description.title: Description
description.description: Description of the effect. This is a brief description of the effect.

quantity.title: Quantity
quantity.description: Item quantity. Applicable to utilities only.

rate.title: Rate
rate.description: Rate spawn of the event. (1/rate every minute)

participants.title: Participants
participants.description: Optional list of additional character names to include in the fight (max 2 additional characters).

receiver_character.description: Character details of the receiving character.

character.title: Character
character.description: Character name. The name of the character who will receive the gold.

receiver_character.description: Character details of the receiving character.

character.description: Character details of the sending character.

character.title: Character
character.description: Character name. The name of the character who will receive the items.

code.title: Code
code.description: Item code. This is the item's unique identifier (ID).

conditions.title: Conditions
conditions.description: Item conditions. If applicable. Conditions for using or equipping the item.

effects.title: Effects
effects.description: List of object effects. For equipment, it will include item stats.

tradeable.title: Tradeable
tradeable.description: Item tradeable status. A non-tradeable item cannot be exchanged or sold.

code.title: Code
code.description: The code of the monster. This is the monster's unique identifier (ID).

drops.title: Drops
drops.description: Monster drops. This is a list of items that the monster drops after killing the monster.

code.title: Code
code.description: The code of the NPC. This is the NPC's unique identifier (ID).

npc.title: Npc
npc.description: Code of the NPC that sells/buys the item.

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: Currency used to buy/sell the item. If it's not gold, it's the item code.

code.title: Code
code.description: The code of the NPC. This is the NPC's unique identifier (ID).

code.title: Code
code.description: The code of the resource. This is the resource's unique identifier (ID).

skill.title: Skill code
skill.description: The skill required to gather this resource.

level.title: Level
level.description: The skill level required to gather this resource.

required_points.title: Required Points
required_points.description: Required achievement points to earn the badge.

badges.title: Badges
badges.description: Season badges with required achievement points.

skins.title: Skins
skins.description: Season skins with required achievement points.

required_points.title: Required Points
required_points.description: Required achievement points to earn the skin.

code.title: Code
code.description: Code of the event to spawn

SpawnEventRequest.description: Model for the request to spawn a specific event

skill.title: Skill
skill.description: Skill required to complete the task.

total.title: Total
total.description: The total required to complete the task.

quantity.title: Quantity
quantity.description: Item quantity. Applicable to utilities only.

data.description: Additional error data (used primarily for validation errors)
